price: 132. Ku amarna salaadda ehelkaaga, oo u samir yeelo gudashada (salaadaha) kuma weydiisaneyno risiq; Annagaa ku irsaaqi. Cidhibta wanaagsan (ee Jannada) waxaa leh kuwa Alle ka cabsada ee iska jira (Cadaabkiisa).
arabic: وَأۡمُرۡ أَهۡلَكَ بِٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَٱصۡطَبِرۡ عَلَيۡهَاۖ لَا نَسۡـَٔلُكَ رِزۡقٗاۖ نَّحۡنُ نَرۡزُقُكَۗ وَٱلۡعَٰقِبَةُ لِلتَّقۡوَىٰ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wamur ahlaka bil-ṣalati wa-iṣ'ṭabir ʿalayhā lā nasaluka riz'qan naḥnu narzuquka wal-ʿāqibatu lilttaqwā
